Jedi Buttercup
hide bio
PM . Follow . Favorite
Joined 03-13-02, id: 183901, Profile Updated: 01-12-17
Author has written 543 stories for Buffy: The Vampire Slayer, Angel, Stargate: SG-1, Harry Potter, Star Wars, StarTrek: The Original Series, StarTrek: The Next Generation, Highlander, Firefly, Pitch Black / Riddick, Boondock Saints, Lake House, Jurassic Park, Pirates of the Caribbean, Stargate: Atlantis, Equilibrium, Godzilla, Lord of the Rings, Mummy, Tin Man, Dresden Files, Misc. Tv Shows, Eureka, Doom, National Treasure, Death Race, Sanctuary, Constantine, Push, CSI, Star Trek: 2009, Die Hard, Leverage, Percy Jackson and the Olympians, Prince of Persia, Aliens/Predator, Sorcerer's Apprentice, 2010, Salt, 2010, Avatar: Last Airbender, Skyline, 2010, Ghost Rider, Silmarillion, Fast and the Furious, Adventures of Brisco County, Jr., Red, Ninja Assassin, Transformers, Person of Interest, Falling Skies, Castle, X-overs, Grimm, Mission: Impossible, Dresden Files, The Prisoner, Men In Black, Terra Nova, Bourne series, Transporter, Walking Dead, Misc. Movies, Expendables, Safe, 2012, Snow White and the Huntsman, Hancock, Melanie Rawn, Criminal Minds, Olympus Has Fallen, Now You See Me, Once Upon a Time, Avengers, Sleepy Hollow, Drive Angry, Pacific Rim, Thor, Battle Creek, TV Commercials, Alice in Wonderland, 2010, Terminator, Independence Day, Batman Begins/Dark Knight, Pride and Prejudice, Dracula 2000, Ice Princess, Unbreakable, Day After Tomorrow, Mansfield Park, Van Helsing, X-Men: The Movie, Bones, Rundown, Heroes, Where the Heart Is, Buffy X-overs, Fifth Element, Kingdom of Heaven, 13 Ghosts, Nanny McPhee, Clueless, Terminator: Sarah Connor Chronicles, Dr. Horrible's Sing-Along Blog, G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra, Big Trouble in Little China, Human Target, Ninja Turtles, Season of the Witch, Persuasion, White Collar, Diablo, Mr. & Mrs. Smith, Guardians of the Galaxy, Dracula Untold, Frozen, and Last Witch Hunter.

(FYI: My fic is also available, and easier to sort by fandom, under the same username at the Archive Of Our Own.)

I've been writing fic since 2002. It's the only real use I've ever put my B.A. in Writing and Literature to; I actually do website and marketing work for a living. This is an exercise in craft for me, and a service to fandom at large. (Plus, y'know, it's fun).

I started out in Buffy fandom, then branched out into Buffy and Stargate crossovers, and I've had a bit of a thing for patching universes together in unusual but hopefully believable ways ever since. Many other fandoms will come and go, especially in the holiday challenge season. Once a year (and only once!) I even put up a Wishlist post at my livejournal and take the first 24 prompts in an offered list of fandoms. So you never know what will show up next!

I'm aware that I have several longer stories that tend to lag months or years between updates. The Muse comes and goes for my epic plotbunnies, and I'm frequently distracted, or laid low by real life concerns. Rest assured, however, that I WILL BE FINISHING my WIPs eventually. I have a schedule. I am working on them! That means NO, I'm not going to adopt any of them out. Be patient; there will be more!

(Let me just make this especially clear: I AM NOT ABANDONING OR ADOPTING OUT ANY OF MY STORIES. STOP ASKING.)

List of biggest WIPs, in order of probable update:

Back Again Harry - Harry Potter time travel - Updated JAN 2017. More soon!
Book's Legacy - Firefly/Serenity - Updated August 2010.
Weathering the Storm - Tin Man/Wizard of Oz - Updated September 2013.
Adventures in Rome - B:tVS/Mummy - Updated December 2015.

Thank you all for your reviews! They help inspire me to continue when motivation lags. However, again, I DO NOT respond to demands to know when I'm updating, or passive aggressive 'this is a good START' comments, or any other attempts to dictate what I write. Please, don't PM me if that's all you have to say.

  • My Stories 543
  • Favorite Stories 500
  • Favorite Authors 68
